name: Intercom NPS Pipeline
description: Pipeline that fetches NPS data from Intercom Series, calculates metrics and saves to BigQuery and Google Sheets. Supports flexible period collection (monthly/quarterly).

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.label: Intercom API Key
parameters.helpText: API key for accessing Intercom data

parameters.name: target_table
parameters.label: BigQuery Target Table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table for NPS data in format project:dataset.table

parameters.name: spreadsheet_id
parameters.label: Google Spreadsheet ID
parameters.helpText: Google Spreadsheet ID for NPS reviews

parameters.name: period_type
parameters.label: Collection Period Type
parameters.helpText: Type of collection period: 'monthly' for monthly collection or 'quarterly' for quarterly collection

parameters.name: period_offset
parameters.label: Period Offset
parameters.helpText: How many periods back to collect data (1 = previous period, 2 = two periods back, etc.)

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.label: Start Date (Override)
parameters.helpText: Override start date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ). If provided, period_type and period_offset are ignored.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.label: End Date (Override)
parameters.helpText: Override end date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ). Must be provided together with start_date.

parameters.name: credentials_path
parameters.label: Service Account Credentials Path
parameters.helpText: Path to service account credentials file for accessing Google Sheets. If not provided, Application Default Credentials will be used.

parameters.name: debug
parameters.label: Debug Mode
parameters.helpText: Enable debug mode to disable period filtering and process all available data
